Edges-Social -- Female Gnome Heroic Rogue
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12+1
Attribute Notes:
Tough: +1 Vigor step
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Brave: +2 Spirit vs. fear, -2 fear table roll
Iron Will: +2 vs. Powers
Strong Willed: +2 Smarts (resist Tests)/+2 Spirit (resist Tests)
Skills (21 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d4+2 Stealth: (agi) d8
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d10 Taunt: (sma) d8
Battle: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Thievery: (agi) d8
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Languages: Common; Gnome; Goblin; Orc; Sylvan
Skill Notes:
Keen Senses: +1 Notice step
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Menacing: +2 Intimidation
Obsessive: +1 Skill Point (d4 in choice of Smarts skill)
Work The Crowd: Increased Work The Room effects
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Humiliate: May reroll Taunt
Rabble-Rouser: May Taunt or Intimidate all foes in 2" radius
Reliable: May reroll Support
Retort: Raise on Intimidation or Taunt Test causes foe to be Distracted
Streetwise: +2 Intimidation (criminal network)/+2 Persuasion (criminal network)/+2 Common Knowledge (criminals)
Work The Room: Roll additional Performance or Persuasion die in Support 2/rd
Size: -1 Deity: Norgorber
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 16; Edge: 4; Skill: 8
Description Notes: Size-1: -1 Size
Features
Edges (3 points): Bolster; Brave; Common Bond; Connections; Humiliate; Iron Will; Menacing; Provoke; Rabble-Rouser; Reliable; Retort; Rogue; Streetwise; Strong Willed; Work The Crowd; Work The Room Hindrances: Greedy; Heroic+; Mean Gnome Features: Gnome Magic; Keen Senses; Low Light Vision; Obsessive; Reduced Pace; Size -1; Tough
Feature Notes:
Rogue: Has Armor Restriction and Sneak Attack features
Common Bond: Communication allows transfer of Bennies to allies
Connections: May call in favors from acquaintance or organization
Greedy: Demands more than a fair share
Heroic+: Always tries to help others
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (0) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Katana (d6+d6+1); Light Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Spear (d6+d6 R3"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Size-1: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Bolster: Successful foe Test removes Distracted or Vulnerable from ally
Provoke: Raise on Taunt inflicts -2 on foe attacks on other targets; joker Action Card ends
Sneak Attack: Successful attack with The Drop or on Vulnerable foe inflicts +d6 damage
Arcana
Power Points: 1
Arcana Notes: Gnome Magic: Knows Beast Friend, Light, Sound, and Telekinesis/1 Power Point
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 3 available vs. 16 allocated
